channel.title: Modern Pkz
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt]Modern Pkz[/size][/center]
THis is my first server so dont flame me on how bad it is.
Features: Bandos god sword spec Armydl GodSword spec Saradomin Godsword spec Sara sword Spec zamaroak god sword spec Darkbow spec hits twice Working prayer Barrows mini You have to kill jad for firecape Magebank pking Freezing ancients Auto Relitate around 50% working player defence 100% working arrow drawback 50% working arrow in air Working barrows effect Working Skulls
Commands so far
::starter - Gives you 1m and runes ::maxhit - Tell you your max hit ::Updates - Shows you the latest updates ::dtrain - teleports you to the training area ::barrows - teleports you to barrows ::jad - Teleports you to jad ::pk - teleports you to mage bank pking ::funpk - Teleports you to funpk ::shops teleports you to shops ::home - teleports you home ::skills - teleports you to skilling area
PICS
[IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/skull.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/p1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/p2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/p3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/p4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/p5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/bgs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/ags.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/zgs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/ss.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/sgs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/dr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/arrow.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/home-3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/pkbox-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/jadmini-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/shops-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/train-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u77/muayad4/barrows-1.jpg[/img]
Credits:
Client- 95% to java is my bitch 5% me server- 25% to mod allstar 25% to everyone who helped me 50% me

[center][size=30pt]Modern Pkz[/size][/center]

THis is my first server so dont flame me on how bad it is.

Features:
Bandos god sword spec
Armydl GodSword spec
Saradomin Godsword spec
Sara sword Spec
zamaroak god sword spec
Darkbow spec hits twice
Working prayer
Barrows mini
You have to kill jad for firecape
Magebank pking
Freezing ancients
Auto Relitate
around 50% working player defence
100% working arrow drawback
50% working arrow in air
Working barrows effect
Working Skulls

Commands so far

::maxhit - Tell you your max hit
::Updates - Shows you the latest updates
::dtrain - teleports you to the training area
